item.title: In Democratic Systems, it is Preferable to Have a Larger Rather Than Smaller Cohort per Generation
item.description: In Democratic Systems, it is Preferable to Have a Larger Rather Than Smaller Cohort per Generation One would think generations would struggle with more competition, but this is not fully the case.

item.title: Ukraine is the Best Way to Undermine Putin
item.description: Ukraine is the Best Way to Undermine Putin Related To: [[Putin’s Invasion of Ukraine]] He keeps saying that Russian people are different from the West as a way to legitimize dictatorship, but he also says that Ukrainians are the same as Russian people.
